# horizontal_alignment enumeration

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/horizontal_alignment
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:08:25.713733

---

`widget` horizontal alignment mode.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Enumerators

The `horizontal_alignment` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `Center` | Center `widget` horizontally within the slot. |
| `Left` | Align `widget` to the left of the slot. |
| `Right` | Align `widget` to the right of the slot. |
| `Fill` | `widget` fills the slot horizontally. |
